statements: SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT user_id, total_income FROM financial_reports WHERE total_income > 5000;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_expenses FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, total_expenses ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT AVG(total_income) AS avg_income FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_id, user_id, report_date, total_expenses, total_income FROM financial_reports WHERE total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_expenses) AS total_expenses_per_user FROM financial_reports GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_expenses_per_user DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_expenses + total_income AS net_profit FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM financial_reports GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 2;
SELECT user_id, MAX(total_income) AS highest_income FROM financial_reports WHERE total_expenses < 1000 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount < 50 AND expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY user_join_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT expense_id, expense_name FROM expenses WHERE expense_name LIKE 'Grocery%' AND expense_amount BETWEEN 20 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, expense_name, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT expense_id, expense_name, amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_date > NOW();
SELECT expense_name, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT expense_name, category_name FROM expenses JOIN expense_category ON expenses.expense_id = expense_category.expense_id JOIN categories ON expense_category.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT expense_name, amount FROM expenses JOIN expense_category ON expenses.expense_id = expense_category.expense_id WHERE expense_category.category_id = 'some_category_id';

SELECT expense_name, amount, category_name FROM expenses JOIN expense_category ON expenses.expense_id = expense_category.expense_id JOIN categories ON expense_category.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE amount < 50 AND category_name = 'Travel' ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Tr%';
SELECT expense_name, amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_name LIKE '%Food%' AND expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE user_id = 'abc123';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT report_id, total_amount FROM reports ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, user_id, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_expenses > 1000;
SELECT e.expense_id, e.amount, u.username FROM expenses e JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT u.username, e.amount, c.category_name FROM expenses e JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id JOIN categories c ON e.category = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses
SELECT expense_date, expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount, expense_date, category_name FROM expenses JOIN categories ON expenses.expense_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(expense_id) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(expense_id) > 5 ORDER BY user_id;

SELECT users.username, expenses.expense_name, transactions.transaction_date FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id JOIN expenses ON transactions.expense_id = expenses.expense_id;

SELECT user_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM transactions JOIN expenses ON transactions.expense_id = expenses.expense_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_expenses > 500 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
